overview:
Björn joined SEB Venture Capital in 1999. He has worked with the SEB Group since 1980 and has been involved in leasing, project financing, international financing and relationship management. He has also lived and worked for the SEB Group in Luxembourg and London. Prior to joining SEB Venture Capital he was a Client Executive with SEB Merchant Banking with the overall responsibility for a group of listed companies.

Björn received a Bachelor of Economy from Economical High school in 1974.

Björn currently serves as director on the board of Neoventa Medical AB, Crossroads Loyalty Solutions AB, Innovationskapital Management and Fond 1, Emers Holfing AB and Connect Väst.

Phone: +46 31 621545 Cell: +46 70 5621545 E-mail: bjorn.osterlund@seb.se
